member.name: NMTTCUSTOMDRAW
member.summary: Contains information specific to an NM_CUSTOMDRAW notification code sent by a tooltip control.

member.name: NMTTCUSTOMDRAW.uDrawFlags
member.summary: Specifies how tooltip text will be formatted when it is displayed. An application may change this field to alter the way text is drawn. This value is passed to the function internally. All values for theuFormat parameter of DrawText are valid.
